SPELLS: Cast a Spell by performing a specific action. As a Defender Wiccan casts a Spell every 10 second(s) following the order below, but this timer resets and moves to the next Spell in order when Wiccan is knocked down, and pauses on his Specials.
Shield (Dash back and hold block for 1.2 second(s)): Gain a 462.5 Resistance Up Passive for 10 second(s). Max 3 Stacks.
Flame (Medium, Light, Light, Light, Medium): Inflicts an Incinerate Passive, reducing Block Proficiency by 50% and dealing 321.6 Energy Damage over 10 second(s).
Silence (Medium, Light, Light, Light, Light): Inflicts a non-stacking Neutralize Passive of 100% Potency that lasts for 5 second(s).

Arcane Theft (Heavy): Gain a Power Gain Passive, granting 1% of Max power over 10 second(s). Nullifies up to one Fury, Precision, or Power Gain Buff off the Opponent to increase the potency of the Power Gain Passive to 5%.
Pause all active Spells and Debuffs for 6 second(s) when casting a Spell that does not exist or activating a Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering 7% of missing Health over 6 second(s). Recovers 100% of missing health caused by Energy Damage from Bursts and damaging Debuffs.
Last 2 hits cast the last casted Spell with duration increased by 8 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: All hits inflict a Shock Debuff, dealing 428.8 Energy Damage over 15 second(s). Inflicting an Incinerate into a Shock, or vice versa, will fuse those two effects into a Plasma that has the property of both, lasting 6 second(s). Plasmas do not pause.

Last hit grants a non-stacking Power Efficiency Buff of 30% Potency, lasting for 3 second(s) plus 3 second(s) per unique Spell active at the beginning of the Special, and pauses during Specials. As a Defender this Buff always lasts 20 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict an Energy Vulnerability Debuff, reducing Energy Resistance by 3435.71 for 20 second(s).

When the Opponent's ability fails due to reduced Ability Accuracy or Wiccan’s personal Immunities, inflict an Incinerate Debuff, reducing Block Proficiency by 50% and dealing 1720.2 Energy Damage over 10 second(s).
SPELLS: Cast a Spell by performing a specific action. As a Defender Wiccan casts a Spell every 10 second(s) following the order below, but this timer resets and moves to the next Spell in order when Wiccan is knocked down, and pauses on his Specials.
Shield (Dash back and hold block for 1.2 second(s)): Gain a 525 Resistance Up Passive for 10 second(s). Max 3 Stacks.
Flame (Medium, Light, Light, Light, Medium): Inflicts an Incinerate Passive, reducing Block Proficiency by 50% and dealing 1720.2 Energy Damage over 10 second(s).
Silence (Medium, Light, Light, Light, Light): Inflicts a non-stacking Neutralize Passive of 100% Potency that lasts for 5 second(s).

Arcane Theft (Heavy): Gain a Power Gain Passive, granting 1% of Max power over 10 second(s). Nullifies up to one Fury, Precision, or Power Gain Buff off the Opponent to increase the potency of the Power Gain Passive to 5%.
Pause all active Spells and Debuffs for 6 second(s) when casting a Spell that does not exist or activating a Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering 7% of missing Health over 6 second(s). Recovers 100% of missing health caused by Energy Damage from Bursts and damaging Debuffs.
Last 2 hits cast the last casted Spell with duration increased by 8 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: All hits inflict a Shock Debuff, dealing 2293.6 Energy Damage over 15 second(s). Inflicting an Incinerate into a Shock, or vice versa, will fuse those two effects into a Plasma that has the property of both, lasting 6 second(s). Plasmas do not pause.

Last hit grants a non-stacking Power Efficiency Buff of 30% Potency, lasting for 3 second(s) plus 3 second(s) per unique Spell active at the beginning of the Special, and pauses during Specials. As a Defender this Buff always lasts 20 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict an Energy Vulnerability Debuff, reducing Energy Resistance by 3900 for 20 second(s).
